title: Sunny Spot in JP (2 Bedrooms Available)
posting_body: An awesome two-floor, two-bathroom, three-bed apartment just a minute walk to Centre Street.
Available September 1st.
Two bedrooms are available in the apartment which is located on the second (and third) floor of a two-family apartment.
An upstairs and downstairs bathroom, large kitchen and living room, and easy access to all of Jamaica Plain's grocery stores, businesses, restaurants, and more.
5 Minute walk to the orange line and also surrounded by different bus stops.
There is currently three people living in the apartment and two of them are leaving, making the apartment available for September 1st.
The landlord is a chill guy who will require a credit check before he officially makes the offer.
The rent is split three ways: $3100 in total (~$1,033 each) with water included.
Electricity, heat, and internet not included but to be split by the three tenants.
No large dogs allowed, but cats are okay.
There is one off-street parking spot available but Green Street has a bunch of on-street parking available as well.
The apartment is largely unfurnished since the current roommates are taking much of the common furniture.
One of the available rooms is pretty standard: big enough for whatever size bed, desk, dresser with a closet and crawl space included.
The other room is more complicated.

The downstairs room is relatively smaller than the other two, but to compensate this room will have their own bathroom, a closet space in the hallway, and potentially an office space where they could work or store their belongings.
This can be discussed more during initial interviews and tours.
About me: 27 year old (he/him), works at a bicycle nonprofit in JP with a hybrid schedule.
I am a responsible and respectful roommate who can get along with mostly anyone in whatever capacity makes sense.
All I ask is that you clean up your own mess in the common spaces and are willing to help with house chores as needed.
I enjoy reading, ecological politics, playing music, and being outdoors.
All genders are welcome.
Don't be a jerk and we will get along fine
(: I will be interviewing initial applicants.
Pictured: both bathrooms, kitchen, living room, both bedrooms, office space
